docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 14.--As the counting of votes in the Nov. 30 election slowly progresses, all political factions appear agreed that no election in Montevideo has ever been characterized by so many frauds and irregularities, and both the Nationalist...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 14.--As the counting of votes in the Nov. 30 election slowly progresses, all political factions appear agreed that no election in Montevideo has ever been characterized by so many frauds and irregularities, and both the Nationalist party and the Riverista faction of the Colorado party are demanding that the election be annulled and a new one called.

headline.main: CALL ON URUGUAY TO VOID ELECTION; Two Factions Ask Another Vote for President as All Agree Fraud Was Widespread. RIVERISTA THREAT REMAINS Group Fails to Get 17 % of Colorado Votes--Trouble Looms IfAgreement Is Canceled.
